text: Abo abeesamba ebyonoono ebinene ne byo buwemu okugyako ebitonotono, (anti) mazima Mukama omulabirizi wo mugazi wa kusonyiwa ye yaasinga okumanya ebikwata ku mmwe, okuva lwe yabatandikawo nga abagya mu ttaka ne mu kiseera we mwaberera mu mbuto za ba Maama ba mmwe, nâ€™olwekyo temwetukuza anti yye yaasinga okumanya ani asinga okumutya
